text: "Amnesia" is a song by the American rock band Red Sun Rising. It was released on May 25, 2016 on their third album Polyester Zeal as the third single. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2016) ! scope="col" | Peak position |- |- |} ==References== Category:2015 songs Category:2016 singles Category:Razor & Tie singles Category:Song recordings produced by Bob Marlette
title: Amnesia (Red Sun Rising song)
